name: D3buGr Railway API Gateway
description: Unified API gateway for cloud-based bug bounty hunting toolkit

llm_context.what: Cloud-deployed security scanning infrastructure on Railway. All tools run as HTTP APIs - offload heavy scans, avoid detection, enable parallel execution.
why: Offload CPU-intensive scans to cloud servers
Scans originate from Railway IPs, not your machine
Run multiple scans simultaneously across services
when: Bug bounty hunting with authorized scope

phases.name: RECON
phases.goal: Map attack surface - subdomains, IPs, ports, services

phases.name: SCANNING
phases.goal: Identify vulnerabilities - CVEs, misconfigs, injection points

phases.name: INTELLIGENCE
phases.goal: Gather context - exposed services, historical data, CVE details

gateway_usage.method: POST for actions, GET for queries
